abstract: The goal is to introduce the UPS Store to new customers as well as to nudge current customers into spending more on additional services.
snippet: The goal is to introduce the UPS Store to new customers as well as to nudge current customers into spending more on additional services.
lead_paragraph: Remember the song about a paper moon, sailing over a cardboard sea? A new campaign conjures up a world where just about everything in sight is cardboard -- and that’s meant to be a good thing.

headline.main: UPS Stores, Ads Assert, Aren’t Just for Shipping Anymore
